document_data.title: Moment of Peace
document_data.story arc:
[[Adventurers League/Dreams of the Red Wizards|Dreams of the Red Wizards]]
Storm King's Descent
document_data.mainbody:
'''''Moment of Peace''''', designed by [[Greg Marks]] and [[Toni Winslow-Brill]], is an adventure in the [[Adventurers League/Dreams of the Red Wizards|Dreams of the Red Wizards]] storyline published for the [[Adventurers League]]. It is the fourth part of the Storm King's Descent series. 

{{Quote|''Armed with a ritual that will let them track the Wyrmskull Throne, the characters travel to a distant mountain, magical desert, and the Outer Planes—but all their success might yet be undone by a vengeful enemy.''{{Cite adventurers league/Moment of Peace|1}}|}}
